comment: So, I was walking through the halls at my college when I see this rather large woman moving in my direction. Her shirt was too short to cover her gut, which was hanging down quite low. I shuddered. When I reached the end of the hallway and turned around, I was greeted by an even worse sight. I could see half of her butt crack.
